title: kancadaLaayadaakshee
sahitya:
kanjadaLAyatAkSi kAmAkSi kamalAmanOhari tripurasundari








anupallavi 






kunjaragamanE maNimaNDita manjuLacaranE mAmavashiva panjarashuki paNkajamukhi guruguha 
ranjani duritabhanjani niranjani 







caraNam 






rAkA shashivadanE suradanE rakSitamadanE ratnasadanE shrIkAncana vasanE surasanE 
shRNgArAshraya mandahasanE EkAnEkAkSari bhuvanEshvari EkAnandAmRtahari bhAsvari EkAgramanOlayakari 
shrIkari EkAmrEsha gRhEshvari shaNkari
